add_lang_desc: Ask the model to speak it
ai_may_not_differ_prompt_and_instruction: Model may not differentiate between prompt and instructions.
ignore_instructions_desc: The output may and will be weird
instructions_desc:
The system prompt describes model's behavior. You cannot change it, but you can recommend changes on GitHub.

It contains user prompt - you can edit it. This will fine-tune model's behavior to your liking.
mock_gemini_1: Hi! I'm Flan-T5, an AI model that runs 100% locally on your device. Since I'm always *in-house*, your data stays private and I work offline.
mock_gemini_2: I can help you with all sorts of tasks, like summarizing text, brainstorming ideas, writing code, or answering complex questions.
mock_gemini_3: It's a type of computing that uses quantum physics to solve problems too complex for regular computers. It's a fascinating topic, even if it's a *bit* hard to grasp!
mock_user_3: Okay, explain 'quantum computing' in one simple sentence.
no_context_yet: AI Early Access. Model may make mistakes and not respond.
recommend_changes_gh: You can recommend changes in the GitHub repository
settings_info:
App is still in development. Please report all errors, mistranslations and leave any feedback on GitHub

Developed by Puzzak, %year% in Ukraine.

Glory to Ukraine!
title: PAIOS
waiting_for_AI: Waiting for model to start generating. If you see this message for longer than expected, this could mean either some error occurred with ML Kit or you've hit the quota (in which case just wait a minute and try again).
waiting_network: AI Core is waiting for WiFi
welcome:
Mock conversation.
Please remember that AI can make mistakes and ignore you. Find more info in settings.
I hope you will enjoy the experience - Puzzak :)
welcome_available: Currently, this model is offered in alpha version and there is a limit of tokens per minute. It may break or produce unexpected results. Please report any issues you encounter on the GitHub repository and remember that AI may make mistakes. Content AI generates does not reflect opinion of the app developer or Google.
welcome_download:
The model is being downloaded by AI Core now, afterwards you will be able to use it offline. Usually the model size is around %size%, but it depends on device and model version.
The AI Core will manage and update the model in background after downloading it. Downloading requires WiFi.
welcome_gtfo:
Model is being downloaded in background. You can close the app.
Exact progress will be unavailable if you do (only the status: downloading, error and so on).
welcome_unavailable:
Unfortunately either your device doesn't support this model or the Google AICore is unavailable to the app. For more information, trouleshooting steps and to report issues, please visit the GitHub repository.

For more information about model availability, please visit the MLKit GenAI documentation.
whoops: Tap to check the AI Core
pinned_chats_desc: To pin chat, go to it's settings
chat_settings_desc: These settings apply only to the current chat. To edit global parameters, open settings.
pin_chat_desc: Pin to the top of the list
no_chats: You haven't yet started a chat. Press a button below to begin.
chats_desc: You have %chatnum% chats. Tap the "New Chat" button to start new chat.
still_generating: The AI is still generating. Please wait until this message is changed to interact with other chats.
analytics_desc: Gather anonymous usage and app issues data
logs_info_local: These are app logs, saved only locally. The local logs are not saved between app restarts and are here to help you understand what is going on in the backend. You can enable analytics if you'd like to help me make the app better.
logs_info_analytics: These are app logs, shared with the developer. The local logs are not saved between app restarts and are here to help you understand what is going on in the backend. The data is anonymous and is only used to gauge app metrics and crashes to make it better. No chat names, messages or any identifiable information is ever sent to analytics. Thank you for helping make the app better for everyone!
